Sql.CDATA: IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'v_INNERLABEL_REPORT_PO' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].[v_INNERLABEL_REPORT_PO] GO CREATE VIEW v_INNERLABEL_REPORT_PO AS SELECT DISTINCT t.CompanyID, t.OrderType, t.InventoryID, k.ValueString AS Customer, t.UsrSOCustomerPO CustomerOrderNbr, l.value AS LotSerialNbr, p.value AS ProdLine, null AS PlannedShipDate, 0 AS PlannedShipQty, 1 AS StartLabelNbr, 1 AS EndLabelNbr, t.ProdOrdID, CASE WHEN (t.QtytoProd - (NowNbr * CAST(c.Value AS decimal))) / CAST(c.Value AS decimal) > 0 then CAST(c.Value as int) ELSE CAST(CAST(c.Value AS decimal) + (t.QtytoProd - (NowNbr * CAST(c.Value AS decimal))) % CAST(c.Value AS decimal) as int) END AS Container FROM AMProdItem t INNER JOIN InventoryItem i ON t.CompanyID = i.CompanyID AND t.InventoryID = i.InventoryID LEFT JOIN CSAnswers c ON t.CompanyID = c.CompanyID AND i.NoteID = c.RefNoteID AND c.AttributeID = 'QTYSBOX' LEFT JOIN AMProdAttribute p ON t.CompanyID = p.CompanyID AND p.AttributeID = 'PRODLINE' AND t.ProdOrdID = p.ProdOrdID AND t.OrderType = p.OrderType LEFT JOIN AMProdAttribute l ON t.CompanyID = l.CompanyID AND l.AttributeID = 'LOTNO' AND t.ProdOrdID = l.ProdOrdID AND t.OrderType = l.OrderType LEFT JOIN SOOrder s ON t.CompanyID = s.CompanyID AND t.UsrSOOrderNbr = s.OrderNbr AND t.UsrSOOrderType = s.OrderType LEFT JOIN SOOrderKvExt k on t.CompanyID = k.CompanyID AND s.NoteID = k.RecordID AND k.FieldName = 'AttributeENDC' CROSS JOIN( SELECT DISTINCT NUMBER AS NowNbr FROM master.dbo.spt_values WHERE name IS NULL ) NumberPool WHERE NowNbr BETWEEN 1 AND t.QtytoProd / CAST(ISNULL(c.Value,1) as decimal) + 1
